jrobots.simulation.simulationObjects.droppables

Class Mine

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrobots.simulation.simulationObjects.droppables.Droppable
      • jrobots.simulation.simulationObjects.droppables.Mine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Mine
extends Droppable
    Mines suit the cowards. They serve you pursuers.
    But those who drive in circles, beware! They serve you, too.

    Mines don't move, so there are no motion targets for them. They may collide with panzers.

    Relevant aspects:

    • Mine deployment:
      • Mine graphics
      • Reload time
      • Arming delay after deployment
        (time driven / distance driven / initial displacement)
    • Detonation:
      • Trigger (distance driven)
      • (Trigger delay, if any)
      • Explosion generation
    • Explosion:
      • Explosion animation (being gaudy)
      • Explosion radius (area effect)
      • Damage dispersion
        (in relation to distance / trigger focused)
      • Force dispersion (in relation to distance)
    • Alteration
      • Decomposition after certain time (with animation)
    Since:
    2008
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public static final double TRIGGER_RADIUS

      • LAUNCHABLE_TRIGGER_RADIUS

        public double LAUNCHABLE_TRIGGER_RADIUS()
        Description copied from class: Droppable
        trigger radius [m] for Launchables to set up the Droppable's effect (explosions etc.). It is class specific.

        Note that this value only applies to approaching Launchables.

        Every descendant may have its own value.

      • TRIGGER_RADIUS

        public double TRIGGER_RADIUS()
        Description copied from class: Droppable
        trigger radius [m] for Panzers to set up Droppable's effect (explosions etc.). It is class specific.

        Also determines the activation distance.
        (see Droppable#calculateMotion)

        Every descendant may have its own value.

        Specified by:
        TRIGGER_RADIUS in class Droppable
